alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 21 at 11:39PM MST until December 22 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...The San Luis Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and slick conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Surface temperatures at or below freezing are likely, and may allow light ice accretion and slick conditions to develop. This will especially be for bridges, elevated surfaces, and lesser used side roads. Extra caution should be taken with any icy conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley
